Notes: A gravity area that pulls objects towards the lateral surface of the cylinder.

Obj_arg0.Name: Edge Type
Obj_arg0.Description: The type of edges that will be used. Default "Both".

Obj_arg1.Name: Valid degrees
Obj_arg1.Description: The radial degrees that will have gravity. Starts pointing towards X+, and then rotates counter clockwise. Default 360.0.

SW_A.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the gravity will be activated when this switch is not activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

DemoSimpleCast.Description: This object will not pause its movement during cutscenes, NPC conversations, etc.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
